that insane coke-hound! [chuckles]

-Exactly. -Wait, what are we doing again?

He made this armor and I've never taken it off.

I hold these truths to be self-evident.
All for one and one for all!

[all] Huzzah!

-Smittay! -[bell chimes]

We're friends.

I'm a smith who works with metal,

-[blacksmith laughs] Nope. -What?

Where am I?

And it was all about how the revolution

A leader for all people!

but I'm just saying, I get it. I got it.

-[groans] George! -Martha!

-Code… Oh! Holy shit! -What?

translation.de: Sagte ich doch. Wir meinen dasselbe.

translation.en: Exactly. Which means that Abe's final edict,
translation.de: Genau. Das heißt, Abes finales Dekret,

translation.en: that I name our freed country America, was itself likely a cipher.
translation.de: dass ich unser Land Amerika nennen soll, war wahrscheinlich eine Chiffre.

translation.en: Hidden within the words of America, my friends,
translation.de: Versteckt im Wort Amerika, meine Freunde,

translation.en: is the Gettysburg Address.
I don't know, seems like kind of a leap.
But I'll need some time to crack the code.
translation.de: Ich brauche Zeit, um den Code zu knacken.

translation.en: In the meantime, someone must run the spoons to Black Smith.
translation.de: Aber jemand muss die Löffel zum Schwarzschmied bringen.

translation.en: [all at once] Not it!
-All right, Chief, that's you. -What the fuck just happened?
translation.de: -Ok, Häuptling, dein Job. -Was war das, verdammt?

translation.en: Did I just lose a game that white people didn't explain the rules to?

translation.en: I can't carry all the silver.
-I only got the one arm. -[laughing] And whose fault is that?
translation.de: -Ich habe nur einen Arm. -Und wer ist schuld?

translation.en: That would be yours. For screwing up Vietnam.
translation.de: Du. Du hast das im Vietnam vermasselt.

translation.en: What are you talking about? We won Vietnam.
translation.de: Wovon redest du? Wir haben in Vietnam gewonnen.

translation.en: [sighs] Actually, if it gives me some time away from you, yeah, I'll do it.

translation.en: -You are a good man, Chief Geronimo. -[Geronimo] Just Geronimo.
translation.de: -Du bist ein Guter, Häuptling Geronimo. -Nur Geronimo.

translation.en: The rest of you, come with me.
I know the perfect place to work on Abe's cipher.
translation.de: Ich weiß, wo wir die Chiffre entschlüsseln.

translation.en: Ugh, come on.
[King James] You left Washington alive.
[Benedict] Uh, yes, a calculated risk, my liege.

translation.en: Instead of trimming one thorn,

translation.en: [King James] And kidnapping his wife?
You're not worried that will motivate him?
translation.de: Hast du keine Angst, dass ihn das motiviert?

translation.en: Oh, I'm counting on it.
Still, we should expedite my… Your plan.
translation.de: Aber wir sollten trotzdem meinen… Euren Plan vorantreiben.

translation.en: Very well. Send me the head engineer.

translation.en: You wanted to see me, Your Majesty?
There's been a slight change of plan.
We'll need my weapon operational sooner than anticipated.
translation.de: Meine Waffe muss schneller als erwartet bereit sein.

translation.en: How much sooner, Your Majesty?
You tell me.
If we work around the clock,
translation.de: Arbeiten wir rund um die Uhr,

translation.en: we could probably have it ready in three weeks?
translation.de: schaffen wir es in drei Wochen?

translation.en: Please, Your Majesty, Your Highness. I can do it faster.
translation.de: Bitte, Eure Majestät, Eure Hoheit. Es geht auch schneller.

translation.en: Ah, thank God.
My foot!
Most impressive.
Manchester, come to Daddy.
Oh, look at the good boy.
Oh, look, you have a little engineer on your face.
translation.de: Du hast einen Ingenieur im Gesicht.

translation.en: Well, I guess I do, too, now.
Don't I? Don't I? Yes!
I'll have Engineering redouble their efforts.
translation.de: Ok. Ich lasse die Technik ihre Anstrengungen verdoppeln.

translation.en: See that you do, Arnold.
Whether or not you succeed with your plan,
translation.de: Ob dein Plan klappt oder nicht,

translation.en: and in case it wasn't clear, I'm not holding my breath,
translation.de: darauf lasse ich es nicht ankommen,

translation.en: Washington is now marching inexorably
into the gnashing maw of the most diabolical war machine
translation.de: in den Rachen der diabolischsten Kriegsmaschine,

translation.en: the world has ever known.
And he doesn't even see it coming.
-[laughs maniacally] -Yes. They never do.
Uh, George? I thought you said you had a safe place to work.
translation.de: George? Ich dachte, du hättest einen sicheren Ort.

translation.en: -What? This looks good to me. -Thank you, Paul.
But this isn't the place I had in mind. That is.
translation.de: Aber diesen Ort meinte ich nicht. Sondern den da.

translation.en: -[all exclaim] -[Paul] It got even better!
[George] Abe, I'm home.
-[hisses] -[exclaims] Pardon me, ma'am.
Oh, my gord, horse toys! Whee!
-George, are you okay, buddy? -[sniffles]
Yes, I am.
But I need to be one with Abe now.
translation.de: Aber ich muss jetzt eins mit Abe sein.

translation.en: I have to get inside of his head if I hope to crack this code.
translation.de: Ich muss in seinen Kopf, um den Code knacken zu können.

translation.en: Okay.
Come on, come on!
Confirm! Please confirm!
We are cruisin'!
Oh, yeah! [chuckles]
Next and next. Next. Too easy.
No, no, don't. No, no. Yes! Reset 30%, please!
translation.de: Nein. Ja! Dreißig Prozent zurücksetzen, bitte!

translation.en: Fuck no! I'm fucked.
No, fuck!
I am rusty, rusty.
Okay, at the hands of this guy is you.
translation.de: Ok, durch den erreiche ich dich.

translation.en: Eternal destruction.
Quick, quick, quick! Thank you.
Return. Return. Yes!
Three, two, one. Go!
Come on. Yeah!
Whoo! Yeah!
You've been hacked, bro!
So, what are you going to do when this is all over, huh?
translation.de: Und, was machst du, wenn das alles vorbei ist?

translation.en: You got family somewhere?
Clyde is my family.
No, I know, but like, you know, people family, friends?
translation.de: Ich weiß, aber ich meine eine menschliche Familie, Freunde?

translation.en: That's why I'm doing this.
You started a war against the most powerful country on Earth to make friends?
translation.de: Du führst Krieg gegen das mächtigste Land der Welt, um Freunde zu finden?

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I did. I never had people friends.

translation.en: Oh, Paul. You have one now.
Thank you. Why do you wanna make war?
translation.de: Danke. Warum willst du den Krieg?

translation.en: They're mean to you and they disrespect you, like a mule.
translation.de: Sie sind gemein und respektlos, wie zu einem Muli.

translation.en: Well, George means well.
translation.de: Na ja, George meint es gut.

translation.en: Sam disrespects me, but he's an idiot.
translation.de: Sam ist respektlos, weil er ein Idiot ist.

translation.en: Listen, lions don't concern themselves with the opinions of sheep.
translation.de: Hör mal, Löwen kümmern sich nicht um die Meinung der Schafe.

translation.en: Well, I'm friends with a lot of sheep and, boy, are they opinionated.
translation.de: Ich habe viele Schafe als Freunde, und die sind echt starrsinnig.

translation.en: -Oh, I just meant-- -[mimics sheep bleating]
That's how sheep talk.
Look, I'm doing this because I want science for everyone.
translation.de: Ich tue das, weil ich Wissenschaft für alle will.

translation.en: Without fear of punishment or persecution or even judgment.
translation.de: Ohne dass sie bestraft, verfolgt oder verurteilt werden.

translation.en: Problem is, the rich white assholes that run the joint
keep telling everyone that science isn't real.
translation.de: sagen allen, Wissenschaft sei nicht real.

translation.en: So, I'm gonna show 'em.
I'm gonna show the whole damn world that science is real.
translation.de: Ich zeige der ganzen Welt, dass Wissenschaft real ist.

translation.en: How are you gonna do that?
By using it to do something that no one can ignore.
translation.de: Indem ich was mache, was keiner ignorieren kann.

translation.en: -I'm going to use science to win a war. -Oh!
translation.de: Ich gewinne mit Wissenschaft einen Krieg.

translation.en: I don't know how I'm gonna do it yet.
But all it takes is one great invention deployed at the perfect time,
translation.de: Aber ich brauche nur eine tolle Erfindung zur rechten Zeit,

translation.en: and then, the whole world will yell at once--
translation.de: und dann ruft die ganze Welt einstimmig…

translation.en: -[door slams open] -Eur-goddamn-reka!
…at which point, I was reminded of one of Abe's favorite exploits.
translation.de: …und dann fiel mir eine von Abes Heldentaten ein.

translation.en: After a reverse hash, I backdoored the root password.
translation.de: Nach der Entschlüsselung kam ich ans Root-Passwort.

translation.en: A base checksum against the main data store
allowed me to retrieve the salted hash,
and then, from there, I was gleaming the cube.
translation.de: und dann wurde es plötzlich genial.

translation.en: George, this is amazing!
You haven't even heard the kicker.
When I extrapolated through a dual node minimum spanning tree,
translation.de: Als ich den minimalen Spannbaum extrapolierte,

translation.en: the cipher's definition revealed itself.
"A" is the first letter of the alphabet,
translation.de: "A" ist der erste Buchstabe im Alphabet,

translation.en: which means it is letter number one.
Therefore, "A" equals one.
-Yeah, I understand all of this. -Oh!
translation.de: Ja, das ist mir schon klar.

translation.en: And if "A" equals one, then--
translation.de: Und wenn "A" gleich eins ist… 1 MERIKA

translation.en: -You've got to be kidding me! -Both of us.
I am not. America equals "1 Merica."
Now, does that word "Merica" ring a bell to any of you?
translation.de: Sagt jemandem von euch das Wort "Merika" was?

translation.en: Oh! Oh! I know! Fuck, I lost it.
Ooh, no. Does it start with a one?
translation.de: Nein. Fängt es mit eins an?

translation.en: Maybe this will jog your memory.
This is ten times magnification.
Oh, my God.
[George] Gentlemen, lady, I give you the Gettysburg Address.
translation.de: 1 MERIKA ST. Meine Herren, meine Dame, die Gettysburg-Adresse.

translation.en: Oh. I guess we… I guess we should've scouted the area, right, guys?
translation.de: Wir… Wir hätten die Gegend auskundschaften sollen.

translation.en: But then we wouldn't have had George's awesome code-cracking scene, right?
translation.de: Dann hätten wir nicht die tolle Code-Entschlüsselungs-Szene.

translation.en: Really? You thought that was awesome?
It wasn't, you know, too indulgent?
No way, dude. Totally realistic.
translation.de: Auf keinen Fall, Alter. Total realistisch.

translation.en: And entirely too short.
Guys, you have got to see this. Look.
translation.de: Jungs, das müsst ihr sehen. Da.

translation.en: [Samuel] What do you see?
[George] Redcoats standing around a table.
translation.de: Rotröcke, die um einen Tisch stehen.

translation.en: And there's only one reason grown men would stand around a table.
translation.de: Und erwachsene Männer tun so was nur aus einem Grund.

translation.en: -To jerk off. -To plot-- What?
-To plot. -Exactly. The meeting's already underway.
Then we haven't a moment to lose.
George, wait. We don't have the silver bullet yet.
translation.de: George, warte. Wir haben noch keine Silberkugel.

translation.en: -We need it to kill Arnold. -Damn it! That's right.
Where the hell are those guys with our silver bullet?
...and then the big dumb one says, "We won Vietnam."
translation.de: Der dumme Riese sagte: "Wir gewannen in Vietnam."

translation.en: Can you imagine being so used to winning at everything for your whole life,

translation.en: that even when you lose, your brain's just like,
translation.de: Wenn man verliert, sagt das Gehirn:

translation.en: "Yo, we must've won that shit, right?"
That's the definition of privilege, right there.
translation.de: Das ist voll die Definition von Privileg.

translation.en: Oh, I've tried to tell them that so many times,
translation.de: Ich versuchte so oft, es ihnen zu erklären,

translation.en: but they don't even hear me.
translation.de: aber die hören mir nicht zu.

translation.en: You wanna get through to them,
you'd have to put your message in like, I don't know,

translation.en: the dumbest thing possible, like a cartoon or something.
translation.de: was ganz Dummes stecken: ein Cartoon oder so.

translation.en: Hey, so how much longer on this silver bullet?

translation.en: -Man, that shit been done for hours. -What?
Oh, yeah.
I can't wait any longer.
I have to rescue my wife and unborn child.
translation.de: Ich rette meine Frau und das ungeborene Kind.

translation.en: If that baby-eating bastard is in there--
Oh, my God! He threatened to eat your unborn baby?
translation.de: Oh Gott! Er will dein ungeborenes Baby essen?

translation.en: No, no, no. I mean, not literally. But, look, he's very evil, Edison.
translation.de: Nein. Nicht wortwörtlich, aber er ist sehr böse, Edison.

translation.en: I mean, come on. Are we splittin' hairs here?
George, without that silver bullet, we'll all be dinner.

translation.en: I know, okay? Look, guys, I don't expect you to go in there.
translation.de: Ich weiß, ok. Ich erwarte nicht, dass ihr mit reinkommt.

translation.en: It's suicide, but I have to.
translation.de: Es ist Selbstmord, aber ich muss.

translation.en: George, we're a team.
If there's even a chance we can save your family,
translation.de: Wenn wir deine Familie retten können,

translation.en: we have to take it. Right, guys?
-Plus, I just heard he eats babies! -Oh, no!
translation.de: -Außerdem hörte ich, er isst Babys. -Oh nein!

translation.en: -Sam, no! -I knew it!
There's no time to lose. Come on. Let's get our sneak on.
translation.de: Wir haben wenig Zeit. Los. Schleichen wir uns ran.

translation.en: [softly] Science.
Uh-huh. The door's not locked.
It didn't need to be. Laser beams.
translation.de: Das ist, weil sie Laserstrahlen haben.

translation.en: Hope you boys are limbered up.
Easy. Easy, does it. Easy, Daddy. Oh, easy.
Uh, guys, this is just yarn.
I'm creeping very quietly.
Don't you move, bad guy!
Look at him go! That's great!
translation.de: Und weg ist er! Das ist super!

translation.en: Ha-ha! What the shit?
Who fucking drew this? This is completely unrealistic.

translation.en: -[man 1 over speaker] Pip-Pip, cheerio. -[man 2] Bob's your uncle.
-[man 1] Ello, guv! -[man 3] Bangers and mash.
That bastard set us up.
-Martha! -George, wait! It's a… trap.
Yep, shit.
-What did they do to your wife? -Paul, that's not Martha.
translation.de: -Was ist mit deiner Frau? -Das ist nicht Martha.

translation.en: It's a hyper-thermobaric bomb.
My hand blasters should interrupt the current to the triggering mechanism.
translation.de: Meine Hand-Sprenger sollten die Leitung zum Auslöser unterbrechen. Wissenschaft.

translation.en: [whispers] Science.
-[beeping] -Oh, what?
Witch, that was your one chance
translation.de: Hexe, das war die Chance für dich,

translation.en: and your beloved science totally fucked us!
I don't understand. I used science.
translation.de: Verstehe ich nicht. Das war Wissenschaft.

translation.en: We're outta time. I have to get this as far away as possible.
translation.de: Wir haben keine Zeit. Ich muss das weit wegbringen.

translation.en: It's up to you guys now.
Save Martha! Save America!
No, you save her yourself, George.

translation.en: This is a job for a racist.

translation.en: The fastest racist in the colonies.
Goodbye, people friends!
Go, Clyde! Fast as the wind!
translation.de: Los, Clyde! So schnell wie der Wind!

translation.en: Hey, compadre, vamanos!
Clyde, what are you talking about?
Clyde can get a lot further away without Pablo's added weight.

translation.en: No! But Clyde is Paul's only friend!
translation.de: Nein! Clyde ist Pauls einziger Freund!

translation.en: -No, Pablo has human friends now. -But, Clyde--
Go! Git! [neighs]
Don't you see?
-Clyde doesn't want Pablo around anymore. -What?
-Git! Damn it, Pablo, git! -Clyde, no!
-Get away! -Clyde, why would you say that? No!
translation.de: -Weg mit dir! -Clyde, warum sagst du das? Nein!

translation.en: [crying] Clyde, please!
Oh, I guess that big idiot really cared about us.
translation.de: Der große Idiot hat uns wohl gemocht.

translation.en: Yeah, he really did.
[George] King James, we meet at last.
Yes, yes. Kudos, Washington.
I see that you managed to evade the trap your old friend Benedict laid for you.
translation.de: Wie ich sehe, konntest du der Falle deines alten Freundes Benedict entkommen.

translation.en: Evade this, butter teeth!
Sam, you're not gonna…
-[laughing] -[Thomas] It's a hologram.
Where's my wife, you bastard?
I believe you mean… Where is your future queen?

translation.en: Never!
Oh, you'll come round.
If you lay even one of your sausage fingers on her,

translation.en: I'll rip your fucking dick off!

translation.en: You better make it quick, George,

translation.en: No more repartee, James.
No more games!
I want you face-to-face.
Hmm. What did you have in mind?
Tomorrow.
For all the fucking marbles.
My squad. Your squad!
You mean, your squad and my giant fuck-off army!

translation.en: Bring me every Redcoat alive for all I care.

translation.en: I accept. Tomorrow morning. Attrition Field.

translation.en: Eight o'clock, sharp. Don't be late.
translation.de: Punkt acht Uhr. Komm nicht zu spät.

translation.en: [Paul yelling] Clyde!
Hmm. He gonna be okay?
You sacrificed Clyde… to save us?

translation.en: Clyde sacrificed himself.
I love my new people friends,
but I loved Clyde, too!
translation.de: aber Clyde habe ich auch geliebt!

translation.en: He was my brother!
There's gotta be something we can do.
translation.de: Wir müssen doch irgendwas tun können.

translation.en: Well, I'm in a book club with Clara Barton.
translation.de: Ich bin mit Clara Barton in einem Buchklub.

translation.en: [scoffs] The groundbreaking medical practitioner?
His name's Clara?
[Clara] I think I can save him.
But it will require the full breadth of my cybernetic research to do so.
translation.de: Dafür muss ich aber meine kybernetische Forschung einsetzen.

translation.en: -Meaning? -Meaning when I'm done…
He'll be more machine than animal.
translation.de: Ist er mehr Maschine als Tier.

translation.en: And there's also a chance

translation.de: Das Pferd schuldet mir drei Dollar, also tun Sie's.

translation.en: It's a long shot. My nanotechnology is advanced,
translation.de: Das wird nicht leicht. Meine Nanotechnologie ist fortgeschritten,

translation.en: but there's really just no substitute for living tissue.
translation.de: aber es gibt keinen Ersatz für Lebendgewebe.

translation.en: Go. I need to be alone with Clyde.
translation.de: Geht. Ich will mit Clyde allein sein.

translation.en: Okay, Paul. Okay.
Say what you will about these colonists,

translation.en: but frying a chicken and putting it in a bucket,
that's a solid idea.
Aren't you thirsty, my queen?

translation.en: You'll feel much more agreeable after a relaxing soak.

translation.en: Arnold, has milady's bath been drawn?

translation.de: Ja, mein Herr. Earl Grey, heiß.

Oh! [laughing] Look at this, it's a double-stuffed pizza crust.

translation.en: Just… I mean, do the maths, Arnold. It's impossible.

translation.en: Did you want some?
Enjoy it while you can, James.
Before my husband rips your fucking dick off!

translation.en: My dear, now that my Ultimate Doomsday Machine is complete,

translation.de: …werden dein Mann und seine verräterischen Taugenichtse

-[scoffs] Why would they do that? -Do what?
Rip their own dicks off?
Because! That's why! [laughs maniacally]
Is he a cookie or is he a puss?
You know what? I don't care. He's my new best friend, that's who he is.
translation.de: Weißt du was? Mir egal. Er ist mein neuer bester Freund.

translation.en: Yes, my king, there is so much this bountiful new land has to offer.

translation.en: Yes. And which corner of my new kingdom
translation.de: Ja. Und welche Ecke meines neuen Königreiches

translation.en: will you choose to rule, I wonder?
Why don't you take a Dakota? Hell, take both.
translation.de: Warum nimmst du nicht ein Dakota? Ach, nimm doch beide.

translation.en: Why don't I take the whole thing? [laughs]
But why?
Because, you double-stuffed buffoon, why would I want to eat a slice…

translation.en: Oh, my God!

translation.de: Endlich hat die Freiheit einen Geburtstag. Morgen.

Go home to your friends,

translation.de: zu euren Familien, zu euren Liebsten.

Bring not the weapons you would use to topple men,

translation.en: The weapons you would use to topple nations.
For tomorrow, our revolution dies

translation.en: and America is born.
Guide me, old friend.
Show me the way.
[Abe] George, I wish I had a million friends like you!
translation.de: George, ich hätte gern Millionen Freunde wie dich!

Well, bless your heart.

translation.en: Um, whatever the firearm equivalent of a massive overreaction would be.

translation.en: Like, for every bullet fired at me,
I'd want to be able to fire several hundred in return.
Oh, I see. And what do you plan on using them for?

translation.en: -Hunting? -Perfect!
I can definitely help you with that.
Now, we do have a waiting period.
And it's over. Let's get you heavily armed, big fella.

translation.de: Fantastisch! Sind Sie nicht Mr. Kinkos Sohn?

translation.en: Yes, sir. Frederick Xavier Kinko. Nice to meet ya.
translation.de: Genau, Sir. Frederick Xavier Kinko. Angenehm.

translation.en: Well, Fred X. Kinko, that's convenient.
translation.de: Tja, Fred X. Kinko, das passt gut.

translation.en: I'm also looking for a photocopier.
The best in the colonies.
